title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7200.6 - Conflict of interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7200.6 - Conflict of interest

State Regulations
A trustee with a past or present
relationship with a claimant or the attorney whose alleged conduct is the
subject of the claim shall disclose such relationship to the trustees and, if
the trustees deem appropriate, that trustee shall not participate in any
proceeding relating to such claim. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7200.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
